onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} makes an appeal to the school principal to have the accusations waived. On account of {Player}â€™s good conduct and strength of character, the principal believes in {Player} and decides to give him another chance. {Player} would go on to graduate from {Capital1} Academy with full honours and, after some years, become a fearsome commander of the {Kingdom#Adjective} army.

{Player} would meet the knight {Knight1} again during the height of the {Kingdom#Adjective} Crusades, a series of long and bloody wars fought by the kingdom of {Kingdom#Name} against its opponents. At the aftermath of one such battle, {Knight1} looked upon the destruction that the {Kingdom#Adjective} army had wrought. She approached {Player} and asked him if this was what he wanted when he joined the academy.
choices: {Player} doubts the validity of the war

onFailure.displayText:
{Player} makes an appeal to the school principal to have the accusations waived. Unfortunately, {Player} was found to be lacking of character and the principal decides to expel him from the academy. After this, he is transferred to {Lab1}, an underground research facility within {Capital1}.

There, {Player} was relentlessly experimented upon by {Kingdom#Adjective} scientists who wanted to find the source of his power and recreate it for themselves. However, many such attempts would fail. Driven by desperation, a scientist by the name of {Scientist} devised a brand new procedure in which {Player} would be subjected to a concoction of dangerous chemicals.
